main event: A steady light was observed moving south near Klamath Falls, California for 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical with no definite outline., It was reported to be blush white and emitted a steady light without flashing., The observation included a trail similar to the wake of a boat, estimated to cover 30 miles of skyline., A pilot officer sighted the object at 40 degrees above the horizon in the northwest quadrant., Additional civilian witnesses observed a bright light with a tail for 3-4 minutes.
witness description: Civilian and military personnel including a control tower operator and pilot.
